title: august 28: emmett till
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the murder of Emmett Till and the spark that ignited the Civil Rights movement. After, Maia recalls the day Twitter lost its mind over Beyonce’s first pregnancy announcement. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
